I'm like; Okay, no biggie, the games are all there and working, I connect the iPod to my Pc and all the media-files look fine so I check again, and now the iPod finds the media files BUT the games don't work anymore " Connect to Pc and reinstall via iTunes "   So I'm now starting the install process again, I'll report back 2 yall ..
Okay, I now understand the problem, when it installs the games it downgrades the iPod to a earlier firmware, witch my itunes later on upgraded so ... If you don't upgrade you will be fine!
